channel.title: [508]SecondScape RS look-alike[508]
channel.description:
Hello everybody,
First of all I will introduce myself, I am Bas, I am 16 years old and I live in Holland. I have my own webdesign company in Holland, with over 20 customers a month xd. I have a lot of experience coding websites and programs. I am not that experienced in Java, but im learning pretty quick.
So, my first project on MoparScape: SecondScape 508. It will be a server that isnt like Buy your full dragon in the dragon shop, and ckicl the attack button to get 99 attack, no, it's going to be just like real RS. You can buy the basic stuff in the shops, and the rest will be dropped by the npc's. Also I'm working really hard to get over 50% of all the RuneScape monsters, including all the dungeons, like the Hill Giant dungeon, and the dungeons beneath the wilderness. When I release this source, almost 90% of all the npc's have been added. Also I will make as much Quests as possible.
First I will finish this 'base', then I will release a beta version that everybody can play, next I will fix the bugs. After that the server stays online untill the server is done, so everybody can see the proggress in real-time.
So, just to start, here some screenshots: [img]http://img710.imageshack.us/img710/8595/43993044.png[/img] [img]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/6569/15824856.png[/img] Custom items, like D claws [img]http://img28.imageshack.us/img28/6456/42977646.png[/img] New models [img]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/4504/72411183.png[/img] Never seen before Shopping Mall - More soon, screenshots, custom made models my me [img]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/8008/46492765.png[/img] Real shops, with AUTO-UPDATING prices right from the RuneScape Database
So, I will post more pictures soon, and I will bring up the beta version online in, lets say 1 week
Thanks for reading, Bas
